llm_response.Key Information Summary: Material: Trockenbau - Gipsplatte (drywall/gypsum board), 25mm thickness. This is layer 1 of 3 in an interior partition wall system (WAN_TWÄ_GK_100) with fire rating EI30. The wall is non-load-bearing and consists of gypsum board-insulation-gypsum board layers.
llm_response.Preliminary Selection: Mineralische Platten, Schüttungen, Steine und Ziegel
